chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall n m p : Z, 0 < p -> Z.mul p n <= Z.mul p m -> n <= m

Premises:
Inductive Z : Set := Z0 : Z | Zpos : positive -> Z | Zneg : positive -> Z Arguments Zpos _%positive_scope Arguments Zneg _%positive_scope
Zmult_lt_reg_r : forall n m p : Z, 0 < p -> n * p < m * p -> n < m
Zmult_gt_0_lt_reg_r : forall n m p : Z, p > 0 -> n * p < m * p -> n < m
Zmult_lt_0_le_reg_r : forall n m p : Z, 0 < p -> n * p <= m * p -> n <= m
Zmult_lt_0_le_compat_r : forall n m p : Z, 0 < p -> n <= m -> n * p <= m * p
Z.mul_le_mono_nonneg_l : forall n m p : Z, 0 <= p -> n <= m -> p * n <= p * m
Zmult_le_reg_r : forall n m p : Z, p > 0 -> n * p <= m * p -> n <= m
Z.lt_le_trans : forall n m p : Z, n < m -> m <= p -> n < p
Z.le_lt_trans : forall n m p : Z, n <= m -> m < p -> n < p
Zmult_le_approx : forall n m p : Z, n > 0 -> n > p -> 0 <= m * n + p -> 0 <= m
Z.mul_lt_mono_pos_r : forall p n m : Z, 0 < p -> n < m < -> n * p < m * p
Z.mul_lt_mono_pos_l : forall p n m : Z, 0 < p -> n < m < -> p * n < p * m
Z.mul_lt_mono_neg_l : forall p n m : Z, p < 0 -> n < m < -> p * m < p * n
Z.mul_le_mono_nonneg : forall n m p q : Z, 0 <= n -> n <= m -> 0 <= p -> p <= q -> n * p <= m * q
Z.mul_le_mono_pos_l : forall n m p : Z, 0 < p -> n <= m < -> p * n <= p * m
Z.mul_le_mono_neg_l : forall n m p : Z, p < 0 -> n <= m < -> p * m <= p * n
Z.mul_le_mono_neg_r : forall n m p : Z, p < 0 -> n <= m < -> m * p <= n * p
Z.mul_le_mono_pos_r : forall n m p : Z, 0 < p -> n <= m < -> n * p <= m * p
Z.mul_cancel_l : forall n m p : Z, p <> 0 -> p * n = p * m < -> n = m
Z.le_exists_sub : forall n m : Z, n <= m -> exists p : Z, m = p + n /\ 0 <= p
Z.add_lt_le_mono : forall n m p q : Z, n < m -> p <= q -> n + p < m + q
Z.add_lt_mono_l : forall n m p : Z, n < m < -> p + n < p + m
Z.add_le_mono_r : forall n m p : Z, n <= m < -> n + p <= m + p
Z.add_le_mono_l : forall n m p : Z, n <= m < -> p + n <= p + m
Z.add_shuffle0 : forall n m p : Z, n + m + p = n + p + m
Z.add_cancel_r : forall n m p : Z, n + p = m + p < -> n = m
Z.mul_add_distr_r : forall n m p : Z, (n + m) * p = n * p + m * p
Z.mul_wd = Morphisms.reflexive_proper Z.mul : Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful Z.eq (Morphisms.respectful Z.eq Z.eq)) Z.mul
Z.add_assoc : forall n m p : Z, n + (m + p) = n + m + p
Z.mul_assoc : forall n m p : Z, n * (m * p) = n * m * p
Z.mul_add_distr_l : forall n m p : Z, n * (m + p) = n * m + n * p
Zdiv_rest_proof : forall (x : Z) (p : positive) (q r : Z), x = q * two_power_pos p + r -> 0 <= r -> r < two_power_pos p -> Zdiv_rest_proofs x p
Pos2Z.is_pos : forall p : positive, 0 < Z.pos p
Zmult_lt_0_reg_r : forall n m : Z, 0 < n -> 0 < m * n -> 0 < m
Z.mul_pos_pos : forall n m : Z, 0 < n -> 0 < m -> 0 < n * m
Zmult_gt_0_lt_0_reg_r : forall n m : Z, n > 0 -> 0 < m * n -> 0 < m
Pos2Z.is_nonneg : forall p : positive, 0 <= Z.pos p
Inductive Zdiv_rest_proofs (x : Z) (p : positive) : Set := Zdiv_rest_proof : forall q r : Z, x = q * two_power_pos p + r -> 0 <= r -> r < two_power_pos p -> Zdiv_rest_proofs x p Arguments Zdiv_rest_proofs _%Z_scope _%positive_scope Arguments Zdiv_rest_proof _%Z_scope _%positive_scope (_ _)%Z_scope
Z.add_nonneg_nonneg : forall n m : Z, 0 <= n -> 0 <= m -> 0 <= n + m
Z.mul_nonneg_nonneg : forall n m : Z, 0 <= n -> 0 <= m -> 0 <= n * m
Z.mul_nonpos_nonpos : forall n m : Z, n <= 0 -> m <= 0 -> 0 <= n * m

```  
intros n m p Hp H.
apply Zmult_lt_0_le_reg_r in H.
apply Zmult_le_reg_r in H.
exact H.
